items.q: Which popular modern rock band features frontman Alex Turner?
items.explanation: Turner is the primary songwriter and lead vocalist for the massive UK indie rock band.

items.q: The first ever episode of the wildly successful animated comedy 'Family Guy' aired before the year 2000.
items.explanation: It premiered right after the Super Bowl in January 1999.

items.q: In the famous 1982 movie 'Blade Runner', Harrison Ford's character Deckard is confirmed definitively on-screen to be a Replicant.
items.explanation: While heavily implied by Ridley Scott in later cuts, the original film deliberately leaves it ambiguous.

items.q: Which iconic 1999 psychological thriller directed by David Fincher famously starred Edward Norton and Brad Pitt and heavily explored themes of consumerism and toxic masculinity?
items.explanation: The film notoriously flopped at the box office before finding massive cult success on DVD.

items.q: What legendary hip-hop duo consisting of Andr√© 3000 and Big Boi released the massive hit album 'Speakerboxxx/The Love Below' in 2003?
items.explanation: The innovative double album won the Grammy for Album of the Year.

items.q: What groundbreaking 1993 sci-fi film directed by Steven Spielberg revolutionized the extensive use of computer-generated imagery (CGI) in cinema?
items.explanation: It flawlessly blended animatronics with unprecedented CGI dinosaurs to historic critical and commercial success.

items.q: In the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' book series (and the 'Game of Thrones' show), what is the sigil (emblem) of House Stark?
items.explanation: The ancient, massive wolves represent the deeply rooted Northern house historically.

items.q: Which critically acclaimed 2007 drama series closely followed the intersecting lives of numerous advertising executives working on Madison Avenue in the 1960s?
items.explanation: It famously won the Emmy for Outstanding Drama Series for its first four consecutive seasons.

items.q: What massively popular video game console released in 2006 featured the incredibly innovative motion-sensing 'Wiimote' controller?
items.explanation: The console dominated the market largely due to its wildly accessible motion controls.

items.q: Which famous artist painted 'The Starry Night'?
items.explanation: Van Gogh painted the iconic masterwork in 1889.
